title: Confessions of a Novice Gamer: The Witcher 3
description:
#TheWitcher #NewGamer
Since watching Netflix latest "The Witcher" series, hubs and I decided to play through the video game by the same name, "The Witch III: Wild Hunt". I am absolute hooked. Never played through a video game really of any kind before and wanted to share my first impressions
#TheWitcher #NewGamer
If you are new please remember to subscribe!

Follow me on twitter here: @andrealynnlewis
Email me here: andreawiththebangs@gmail.com
